name: pain. (Demo) (Liuss)
description:
The idea for pain. was a boss battle centered bullet hell game with platformer and shooter mechanics mixed in.

I've been sporadically working on this project for over a year now and have come to the conclusion that it would be best to leave it as is for now. Although I hope to flesh it out somehow in the future, possibly when I get the funds to get a team together.

For now, I hope you enjoy this hellish bullet hell prototype.
